After covering himself in his [[Lightning Release Chakra Mode]], [[Fourth Raikage|A]] performs a simple backhanded horizontal chop against his opponent, which is powerful enough to snap even the bones of [[Sasuke Uchiha]]'s [[Susanoo]]'s ribcage.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 463, pages 15-17</ref>

== Trivia ==
* The Japanese term for the backhand chop used in pro-wrestling is {{translation|"reverse '''horizontal''' chop"|逆'''水平'''チョップ|gyaku'''suihei''' choppu}}.
* Although it was not outright stated, [[C]] implied that this is also a certain-kill technique as when healing A, C expressed that Sasuke surviving this in addition to the Liger Bomb was proof of Sasuke's genius and potential as a shinobi.
